name: Asteroids-Retro
description:
Experience the past in this lovingly re-created arcade game from the years before the personal computer.

Asteroids-Retro brings back the original game with only a few changes to the game experience.

The game runs in a 640 x 480 windowed screen.

Just run the installer and click the desktop icon to warp back to the past!

Or if you just want to play the game online, visit Lazy Mutt Games online arcade:
https://lazymuttgames.com/games/Asteroids-Retro/demo

"Asteroids is an arcade space shooter released in November 1979 by Atari, Inc. and designed by Lyle Rains, Ed Logg, and Dominic Walsh." - IGN
